hero.title: Healthy & Beautiful Smiles, Guaranteed
hero.subtitle: Trust our experienced team for comprehensive dental care. We're dedicated to your long-term oral health and a smile you'll love.

services.title: Comprehensive Dental Care
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of dental services to meet all your oral health needs in one convenient location.

preventiveCare.title: Preventive Care
preventiveCare.description: Regular check-ups, cleanings, and screenings to prevent dental issues before they start.

cosmeticDentistry.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
cosmeticDentistry.description: Enhance your smile with teeth whitening, veneers, and other cosmetic procedures.

restorativeServices.title: Restorative Services
restorativeServices.description: Repair damaged teeth with fillings, crowns, bridges, and dental implants.

familyDentistry.title: Family Dentistry
familyDentistry.description: Dental care for patients of all ages, from children to seniors.

emergencyCare.title: Emergency Care
emergencyCare.description: Prompt treatment for dental emergencies such as toothaches or broken teeth.

advancedTechnology.title: Advanced Technology
advancedTechnology.description: State-of-the-art equipment and techniques for more comfortable and effective treatments.

team.title: Meet Our Dental Team
team.subtitle: Our experienced dentists and staff are dedicated to providing you with the highest quality care.

dr1.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
dr1.title: General Dentist
dr1.bio: Dr. Johnson has over 15 years of experience in general and cosmetic dentistry.

dr2.name: Dr. Michael Chen
dr2.title: Orthodontist
dr2.bio: Dr. Chen specializes in orthodontics and is an expert in Invisalign treatments.

dr3.name: Dr. Emily Rodriguez
dr3.title: Pediatric Dentist
dr3.bio: Dr. Rodriguez loves working with children and making dental visits fun and stress-free.

item1.author: - Jennifer L.
item1.text: I've been coming to Dentiluri for years, and I've always had a positive experience. The staff is friendly, and Dr. Johnson is thorough and gentle.

item2.author: - Mark T.
item2.text: My kids love going to Dr. Rodriguez! She makes them feel comfortable and explains everything in a way they can understand. Highly recommend for families.

appointment.subtitle: We're accepting new patients! Schedule your appointment online or give us a call.

convenientScheduling.title: Convenient Scheduling
convenientScheduling.description: Book online 24/7 or call during office hours

extendedHours.title: Extended Hours
extendedHours.description: Open evenings and select Saturdays for your convenience

insuranceAccepted.title: Insurance Accepted
insuranceAccepted.description: We work with most major insurance providers

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or ready to schedule? Reach out to our friendly team.

hero.title: About Dentiluri
hero.subtitle: Providing exceptional dental care to our community for over 20 years.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Dentiluri was founded in 2003 by Dr. Sarah Johnson with a simple mission: to provide high-quality, compassionate dental care to patients of all ages. What started as a small practice has grown into a trusted dental care provider in our community.
story.content2: Our team of experienced dentists, hygienists, and staff are dedicated to making your dental experience as comfortable and stress-free as possible. We believe in building long-term relationships with our patients based on trust, respect, and exceptional care.
story.content3: At Dentiluri, we stay at the forefront of dental technology and techniques to ensure you receive the most effective and comfortable treatments available.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the dedicated professionals who make Dentiluri special.

mission.title: Our Mission & Values
mission.content: At Dentiluri, our mission is to improve the oral health of our community by providing comprehensive, personalized dental care in a comfortable and welcoming environment.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in all aspects of our practice, from clinical care to customer service.

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We treat each patient with kindness, empathy, and respect, understanding that dental visits can be stressful for many.

education.title: Education
education.description: We believe in empowering our patients with knowledge about their oral health so they can make informed decisions.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously invest in advanced technology and techniques to provide the best possible care.

facility.title: Our Facility
facility.subtitle: Our modern dental office is designed with your comfort in mind.

cta.title: Ready to Schedule?
cta.subtitle: We're accepting new patients and would love to welcome you to our dental family.

hero.title: Our Dental Services
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive dental care for the whole family, all in one convenient location.

preventive.title: Maintain Your Smile
preventive.content: Regular preventive care is the foundation of good oral health. Our comprehensive preventive services help you maintain a healthy smile and prevent dental problems before they start.

cosmetic.title: Enhance Your Smile
cosmetic.content: Our cosmetic dental services can help you achieve the beautiful, confident smile you've always wanted. We offer a range of treatments to address discoloration, misalignment, and other aesthetic concerns.

restorative.title: Repair Your Smile
restorative.content: Our restorative dental services can help repair damaged teeth and replace missing teeth, restoring both function and appearance to your smile.

specialized.title: Specialized Services
specialized.subtitle: We offer a range of specialized dental services to meet all your oral health needs.

insurance.title: Insurance & Financing
insurance.subtitle: We work with most major insurance providers and offer flexible financing options.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.content: We accept most major dental insurance plans and are in-network with many providers. Our team will help you maximize your benefits.

payment.title: Payment Options
payment.content: We accept cash, checks, and all major credit cards for your convenience.

financing.title: Financing
financing.content: We offer flexible financing options through CareCredit to help make dental care more affordable.

expectation.title: What to Expect
expectation.subtitle: Information for your upcoming appointment
points: Please arrive 15 minutes early to complete any necessary paperwork.
Bring your insurance card and photo ID.
If you have dental x-rays from the past 6 months, please bring them with you.
